name: Legends of Runeterra
description: Downloads and launches the Riot's installer to allow installation of Legends Of Runettera. Dxvk enabled.
notes:
Script starts up the Riot launcher, user is required to login and manage launcher's installation of the Legends Of Runeterra.

- Running the game straight after installation (from the Riot launcher) is buggy and might not work. CLOSE THE RIOT LAUNCHER BEFORE LOGGING IN to finish the installation, then start the game normally.
- If the game crashes or you have experienced connection error there might be stale processes left (even after closing  the game/lutris,  RiotClientCrash, LoRCrashHandler, ...). These processes might prevent you from starting the game again and have to be force killed.
content:
files:
- lor_installer: https://bacon.secure.dyn.riotcdn.net/channels/public/x/installer/current/live.exe
game:
  args: --launch-product=bacon --launch-patchline=live
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Riot Games/Riot Client/RiotClientServices.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: GrabFullScreen
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\X11 Driver
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: Y
- task:
    arch: win64
    key: UseXVidMode
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Wine\X11 Driver
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: N
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Installing Legends of Runeterra
    executable: lor_installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: d3dcompiler_43 d3dx9 wininet dotnet48
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  disable_compositor: true
  env:
    DXVK_LOG_LEVEL: none
    DXVK_STATE_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
    STAGING_SHARED_MEMORY: 1
    WINE_LARGE_ADDRESS_AWARE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
  MouseWarpOverride: disable
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
